documents.page_content: 1) Food for special medical purposes,특정의료용도식품 2) Good Manufacturing Practice,우수의약품제조・관리기준 3) 위해분석과중요관제점의영문약자(HazardAnalysis and Critical Control Points)

제품분류제품설명제품이미지
당뇨병환자용 제품당뇨병환자에게균형잡힌영양을 제공하는음료로혈당치를관리하는데 도움이되도록고품질단백질,탄수화물,25개 의비타민과미네랄의영양소가포함된제품
신장질환자용 제품신장질환자의영양보충을위해단백질, 비타민,미네랄이포함된제품
당뇨병및 고혈당증 환자용제품당뇨병이나고혈당증환자의혈당조절과 영양공급을위해튜브식으로만들어진 제품이며소화작용을도와주는프리바이오틱 섬유소인PREBIO가포함된제품

제품분류제품설명제품이미지
당뇨병환자 대용식당뇨병환자들을위한대용식으로, '카브스테디'라는탄수화물이혈당지수를 낮추고소화되는속도를늦춰혈당수치의 상승을최소화시키는역할을함
유아용 보충제단백질섭취가어려운유아들을위한 경구및경관급식용아미노선보충제
고령층용 영양식음료소실된근육의재형성을돕고,새로운힘과 에너지를공급해주는고령층타깃 영양식음료

제품분류제품설명제품이미지
페닐케톤뇨증 환자용제품페틸케뇨증이있는환자의식이관리에적합한 식품으로필수아미노산,탄수화물,지방,비타민, 미네랄,DHA,ARA를함유한아미노산기반의 제품으로유일한영양공급원으로사용하기 적합하지않으므로다른식품과함께 사용하는것이효과적인제품
단백질대사질 환용제품단백질대사질환이있는환자의 식이관리를위한단백질대체제품으로 분말형식으로이루어져있음
소아 신장질환용 제품소아신장질환환자를위한제품으로,단백질, 아미노산,탄수화물,지방,비타민,미네랄및 불포화지방산을함유하고단백질,칼슘,칼륨, 인,비타민A가적게들어간분말형식의 의료용식품이며,경구,경관형식으로복용가능함
# Compositions and methods for modulating metabolic pathways
Lactobacillus and composition for preventing, improving, or treating degenerative brain diseases or cognitive function disorders
University-Industry Cooperation Group of Kyung Hee University
Tau protein production accelerator, and therapeutic or preventive agent and therapeutic or preventive food composition for diseases caused by tau protein deficiency
Food comprising glucomannan, xanthan gum and alginate for the treatment of metabolic disorders
Food comprising glucomannan, xanthan gum and alginate for the treatment of metabolic disorders
Composition comprising the extract of herbal combination for preventing or treating diabetic peripheral neuropathy
* Ribes nigrum Oleum Acini(블랙커런트씨오일)및 Elaeis guineensis Oleum(팜유)중
* Thymus vulgaris(백리향), Cicer arietinum(병아리콩), Ervum lens(렌즈콩)중
* Fucus vesiculosus(푸쿠스), Undaria pinnatifida(미역), Palmaria palmata(덜스), Porphyra umbilicalis(김)중
* vitamins A, B1, B2, B5, B6, B9, C, E, PP(B3)중
Compositions comprising unsaturated fatty acids and nitric oxide releasing compounds and use thereof for enhancing cognitive and related functions
Llowering circulating oxidized low density lipoprotein-beta-2-glycoprotein 1 complex for treatment of atherosclerosclerosis
Catecholamine production accelerator, and therapeutic and preventive agent and therapeutic and preventive food composition for diseases caused by catecholamine deficiency
Fiber-rich maltooligosaccharides having low glucose bioavailability, method of manufacture thereof and use thereof in human food and animal feed
Probiotic compositions for the treatment of obesity and obesity-related conditions
Phytocomplexes exhibiting multiple, synergistic antioxidant activities useful in foods, dietary supplements, cosmetics and pharmaceutical preparations
# Composition and method for control of post-prandial glucose
Dietary compositions for reducing blood glucose levels and for weight management
Composition for preventing or treating cervical cancer including gypenoside LXXV
·노령자를위한식사가정배달서비스를제공하는주요기업으로는DineWise,Martha'sSenior Gourmet, Community Action Agency of Butte Country, Inc 및Bartlett Center, Inc.등이있음
·연하곤란을겪고있는고령자들을위한식품을만들기위해EU지원에따라 PERFORMENCE(PERsonalized food For the Nutrition of Elderly ConsumErs)라는프로젝트를 2012년부터2015년까지진행함
# Composition comprising cinnamaldehyde and zinc to improve swallowing
# Compositions for use in nutrition of dysphagia patients
Method of manufacturing a meat replacement product and a meat replacement food product
# Method for producing meat substitute products
Method for producing meat substitute products
Process for the preparation of lactose-free and reduced phosphorus skim milk
